attributes.action: give more benefits and help to stay at home mums
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We would like the goverment to support mums who choose to stay at home and raise their children! instead of pressurising parents back to work and their children into full time child care!

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "give more benefits and help to stay at home mums."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11733.asp

Prime Minister's Office
